metadata.name: Forgetful tree #1 - Age 1650 - Nickel
metadata.description:
A Generative Artwork - Created  through code.  
The first series was released on paper in 2017. In 2022 the algorithm has been revisited and new trees generated, to be immortalised on the blockchain.  
Each nft is a 1/1 edition of the Forgetful Trees collection.

The Algorithm:  
Taking inspiration from ant colonies in nature, hundreds of agents are sent out from a single point, to explore the landscape until they perish. They leave a scent trail for following generations to find their way. As time passes, the memory fades. While regularly travelled paths and memories are reinforced, others disappear completely.  
This is an emergent system: through layering of colour as paths are travelled, a unique tree-like drawing materialises.  
The growing cycle is stopped (by intervention) at some point, when the tree has found and passed its most beautiful configuration, which may be a different generation each time.  
Age: 1650 Generations  
Emergent Colour:  Nickel
